content: One last thing, I didn't talk much about the sales side because we've talked about it quite a bit and how to frame, so I don't want you to think I want that excluded, unless you think it isn't worth pursuing those types of roles. But did sales in my consulting business, and at the 2 software companies in support or temporary capacities as we've discussed. I'm not pushing for that to be included, but want to ensure you have full picture. Let's just start with the core strengths and marketable roles with your reasoning and then can move on to the profile updates.
